FuncDef: By default, load balancing is supported. For details about the maximum number of equal-cost routes, see the parameter value range. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of equal-costs for load balancing.
The value is an integer. The value ranges from 1 to 128. The default value is 128.

ExtraInfo: IPv6 has been enabled for the IS-IS process using the ipv6 enable command in the IS-IS view.
